resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107612</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107612</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206697</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Earth Explorers Series</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse Forscher-Serie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Série d'Explorateurs de la Terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Série Dos Exploradores Da Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Serie Degli Esploratori Della Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σειρά γήινων εξερευνητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Serie De los Exploradores De la Tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">profiles an atmospheric scientist who flies through hurricanes, an engineer who operates a spectro-radiometer (an instrument on a satellite), an ocean scientist, high school students whose science fair project took them to Croatia, and other Earth explorers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erstellt einen atmosphärischen Wissenschaftler ein
Profil, der durch Hurrikane, ein Ingenieur fliegt, der ein 
Spectroradiometer (ein Instrument auf einem Satelliten), einen 
Ozeanwissenschaftler, High School Kursteilnehmer dessen Wissenschaft 
angemessenes Projekt sie nach Kroatien nahm und andere Masse Forscher 
laufen läßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">profile un scientifique atmosphérique qui vole par
des ouragans, un ingénieur qui actionne un spectro-radiomètre (un 
instrument sur un satellite), un scientifique d'océan, des étudiants
de lycée dont le projet juste de la science les a portés en Croatie,
et d'autres explorateurs de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">perfila um cientista atmosférico que voe com os 
furacões, um coordenador que opere um spectro-spectro-radiometer (um 
instrumento em um satélite), um cientista do oceano, uns estudantes 
da High School cujo o projeto justo da ciência faça exame d ao 
croatia, e outros exploradores da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">profila uno scienziato atmosferico che vola con gli
uragani, un assistente tecnico che funziona un spectro-radiometro (uno
strumento su un satellite), uno scienziato dell'oceano, gli allievi 
della High School di cui il progetto giusto di scienza li ha presi nel
croatia ed altri esploratori della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχεδιαγράμματα ένας ατμοσφαιρικός επιστήμονας που 
πετά μέσω των τυφώνων, ένας μηχανικός που ενεργοποιεί ένα 
σπεκτροραδιόμετρο (ένα όργανο σε έναν δορυφόρο), ένας ωκεάνιος 
επιστήμονας, σπουδαστές γυμνασίου το των οποίων δίκαιο πρόγραμμα
επιστήμης πήρε τους στην Κροατία, και άλλους γήινους 
εξερευνητές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">perfila a científico atmosférico que vuela con 
los huracanes, ingeniero que funcione a un spectro-radio'metro (un 
instrumento en un satélite), a un científico del océano, a los 
estudiantes de la High School secundaria que proyecto justo de la 
ciencia los llevó al croatia, y a otros exploradores de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206697</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107612</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/earth-explorers-series</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
